title: What is the interpretation of a dream about a storm?  Does it have a negative meaning?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a storm: Seeing a storm in a dream is one of the dreams that has many interpretations and proofs depending on its condition and form. In this article we will explain whether it is good or if there are some other nutritional elements that the dreamer should be aware of? We will clarify the details to calm the heart of the reader and quickly reach the correct meaning. Interpretation of a dream about a storm: For the dreamer, seeing a storm in a dream indicates positive changes that will occur in his life in the coming days and will make it more calm and stable than the previous period. Seeing a storm in a girl’s dream symbolizes the end of family disputes that were It happens to her because of the entry of a corrupt woman who wants to destroy her home and create a big gap between her parents and the dreamer’s storm. Sleep leads her to learn about her recovery from the diseases she was suffering from and prevents her from succeeding. Interpretation of a dream about a storm by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that seeing a storm in a dream for the dreamer indicates good news that he will learn in the coming period and his life will transform from escape and sadness to happiness and comfort. And you have to be patient until you get rid of it. Watching a storm in a dream for a girl indicates the dangers that she will face due to entering into a relationship with a man with a bad character, so that she can enjoy superiority in the coming period. The Asrar website for dream interpretation is a website specialized in dream interpretation in the Arab world. Just write a website About the secrets of dream interpretation, search for it on Google and get the correct interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about a storm for a single woman. Seeing a storm in a dream for an unmarried woman means a lot of goodness and benefits that will happen in her future life, and a dust storm in a dream for the sleeper indicates the anxiety and tension that she will go through due to the delay in her marriage. And her fear of an uncertain future for her. Watching the storm and rain in a dream for a girl indicates the proximity of comfort and death from the crises and pain that she complained about in the past, and the storm in the dreamer’s sleep symbolizes the decent life in which she lives with her family and their support until she reaches her desires and goals in practical life and achieves them on the way. Reality. Interpretation of a dream about a dust storm for a single woman. Seeing a dust storm in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates the crises and obstacles that she will face on her path to success and hinder her, which will affect her. Useful. Interpretation of a dream about a storm for a married woman. Seeing a storm in a dream for a married woman indicates stress and fatigue that will pass in the near future, due to responsibility for the home and family and her neglect by her husband, which may prompt her to request separation from him so that he can live in comfort and security, and the inability of her husband’s personality to Dealing with problems and disputes negatively. Watching the storm pass in a dream without destruction or damage leads her to learn the news of her long-awaited pregnancy. Interpretation of a dream about a storm for a pregnant woman. Seeing a storm in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates an easy birth and frees her from the problems and pains that greatly affected her state of mind. In the previous period, the light storm in the dream l

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing your uncle’s wife crying in a dream. Below we present the interpretation of a dream about seeing your uncle’s wife crying in a dream, as reported by scholars, and other details of interest to you. Interpretation of a dream about seeing your uncle’s wife crying in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about seeing your uncle’s wife crying in a dream can lead to problems in the family, by God. I know the unseen. When you see your uncle’s wife crying in a dream, this may be a sign of discomfort, and God knows best. If a married woman sees her uncle’s wife crying in a dream, this may be a sign of a problem in the family, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about quarreling with your uncle’s wife in a dream. Interpretation of a dream may indicate A quarrel with an uncle’s wife in a dream indicates the help he receives, and God knows the unseen. title: I dreamed that I was pulling my hair out of my son's mouth

preview.html: What is the interpretation of a dream that I was pulling hair from my son’s mouth in a dream? This is what we answer through our article, as the world of dreams is full of secrets and mysteries that some consider to be facts and not just dreams. Joseph, with his interpretation, and Abraham, peace be upon him, inspired Abraham to slaughter his son Ishmael and God Almighty ransomed him with a great sacrifice to be a feast for all Muslims. Through the encyclopedia, follow us. I dreamed that I was pulling my hair out of my son’s mouth. Dream interpretation scholars interpret the dream of pulling hair out of my son’s mouth and his hair coming out of the mouth on various occasions with many interpretations that carry connotations and symbols, so let us decode the amulets of this dream as follows: Ibn Sirin interprets Seeing hair coming out of the son's mouth. By a touch or spell it falls upon the fortuneteller. God knows best. Also, seeing hair being pulled and pulled indicates in reality a feeling of intense fear and anxiety. Seeing hair coming out from between a child’s teeth is interpreted as evidence that something bad has happened to the fortuneteller, and it will go away with the recitation of the legitimate ruqyah. The dream indicates that long, tied hair comes out of the mouth. . About the problems that appear in the dreamer’s life, and God knows best. To dream of plucking hair means changing one’s situation and losing money. It is a vision that does not bode well at all. As for seeing hair coming out of a girl’s mouth. It indicates the health, protection, and longevity that the fortuneteller enjoys. The vision of hair coming out of the food that the viewer eats is interpreted. In the successive material crises that accompany the path of insight into reality, and in the pains that he sees, and from which he will soon be saved if he turns to God. The scholar Ibn Sirin interpreted the vision of hair emerging from the mouth according to the length of the hair, its texture, and its appearance. Plucking long hair from the mouth symbolizes longevity and eye health, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about hair coming out of the mouth for a single woman: Seeing hair coming out of the mouth raises many questions in the mind of an unmarried girl who is happily waiting for a date, whether in a relationship or a promotion at work. According to dream interpretation scholars: It follows: Seeing one girl in a dream symbolizes thick and complex hair. There are diseases and trials that test her patience and strength, then God removes sadness and illness from her, and God knows best. Seeing long hair coming out in large quantities from one woman’s mouth. In her marriage to a person of good character and reputation, she enjoys the luxury of living with him. Seeing hair coming out of his father’s mouth indicates an unmarried girl. In the prestigious job that you obtain, where social status and abundant money are permissible. Seeing an unmarried woman having her hair pulled from her mouth leads to getting rid of the diseases that afflicted her and weakened her strength and abilities in the past days, and God is the best healer. Interpretation of a dream about hair coming out of a married woman’s mouthSeeing a married woman In a dream, hair coming out of her mouth has many meanings and connotations, so we take a look at the most important of them below, and it explains seeing one’s hair coming out of her mouth. In livelihood, kindness, longevity, health and protection, the path will follow them throughout their lives, and God knows best. Seeing a married woman in a dream symbolizes a large group of...

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a sheep in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing sheep in a dream, or as it is called sheep, is one of the domestic animals known since ancient times, as sheep are raised in many places, including homes or farms, and lamb’s wool is used to make many woolen clothes and shoes, but today we will do that. Learn what is the interpretation of seeing sheep in a dream according to the great Arab interpreters. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a sheep by Ibn Sirin, as Ibn Sirin explained in the interpretation books on Look at the sheep in the sign of victory if the lamb is seen in a war or battle. Seeing a debtor or prisoner slaughtering a sheep in a dream means that relief will come soon. Seeing the benefits of sheep wool in a dream means that you will get a lot of money. If you see a dreamer eating an immature sheep, this means that the dreamer will catch one of them. Interpretation of a dream of one sheep If you see a small white sheep in an unmarried woman’s dream, this indicates marriage to her soon Seeing a small white sheep shows a weak character. Seeing a black sheep in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates a temporary love in her life, which will soon go away. Seeing a black sheep in an unmarried woman’s dream means good luck for her. Interpretation of a dream about a sheep for a married woman. Seeing a married woman buying A sheep in a dream means that she is spending her money at home in reality. Seeing a white sheep given to her as a gift from a dead person indicates that this dead person requires her constant charity. If a married woman sees that a stranger is giving her a sheep as a gift, this means that there is an old covenant or promise between them. And she did not achieve it. Also, seeing a white sheep in a married woman’s dream indicates that she has a lot of money. Interpretation of a dream about pregnancy for a pregnant woman. Seeing a pregnancy in a dream means that she will give birth to a male child. Seeing a group of sheep in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates the number of months remaining in the pregnancy. Vision A sheep in a pregnant woman’s dream is generally a good vision for her and portends goodness and blessings. Interpretation of a dream about slaughtering a sheep. Seeing a slaughtered sheep in a dream is a warning of the death of someone close to the dreamer. Seeing another person slaughtering a sheep is good news that he will soon travel to perform the Hajj rituals.

title: Interpretation of seeing my teacher in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing my teacher in a dream by Ibn Sirin, Nabulsi, Ibn Shaheen, Ibn Kathir, and Imam Sadiq. The married woman, the pregnant woman, the man, and the young man. What is my teacher’s interpretation of seeing an unmarried girl in a dream? A single girl sees her teacher in a dream, and her screaming strongly indicates that she is dealing with major family issues that she is trying to solve. Seeing an unmarried girl following her teacher’s instructions in a dream indicates her high status among people, And the power of her knowledge and the world’s use of it. Seeing children teaching in a dream is an indication of the high level among people and their great respect for him. Seeing a former teacher in a dream is an indication of excellence and success in academic and professional life. See also: Interpretation of seeing a school in a dream. What is the interpretation of a married woman seeing a teacher in a dream? A married woman seeing a teacher in a dream is a sign that all her family’s problems will soon be resolved. Seeing a married woman talking to her teacher in a dream is a sign of her victory over her enemies and the beginning of a happy, independent life. Seeing a teacher in a dream is a sign of good children, their high morals, and their high status among people. What is the interpretation of a man Who sees a teacher in a dream? A man seeing a teacher in a dream is an indication that he will get a great job in a company and it will bring him many benefits and a lot of good. A man seeing his former teacher in a dream is an indication that he will soon marry a beautiful girl with a high moral character. Seeing a teacher in a dream is a sign of... The reputation of the fortuneteller among the people, their respect for him, his pride and high self-confidence. See also: Interpretation of a dream about entering a school to memorize the Qur’an. What is the interpretation of a pregnant woman seeing a teacher in a dream? A pregnant woman seeing a teacher in a dream indicates the stability of her family life and great happiness with her husband and children, with the approach of comfort and the disappearance of their sorrows. A pregnant woman seeing her new teacher in a dream indicates that she will obtain the highest grades and positions in her studies and her new job. Seeing a teacher in a dream indicates giving birth to children of great importance in society and being fair to her, overcoming all the pains and difficulties of childbirth and giving her a healthy child. See also: Interpretation of seeing a pencil sharpener. In a dream: What is the interpretation of a young man seeing a teacher in a dream? A young man seeing his former teacher in a dream appears to be thinking strongly about the relationship with the girl he loves and adores deeply. A young man seeing a teacher in a dream is an indication of wisdom, sobriety, correct behavior, and helping others. Seeing a teacher in a dream is a sign of pride, pride, and superiority in all matters of life. What is Ibn Shaheen’s interpretation of a teacher in a dream? Seeing a teacher in a dream by Ibn Shaheen is a sign of the failure of insight in managing his life and solving his problems, and he must act with caution. Seeing a religious teacher in a dream is an indication of the seriousness of the religiosity of the witness of the vision and his closeness to God Almighty. Seeing a teacher in a dream is an indication of the dreamer’s exploitation. For all the opportunities in his life and benefiting from his problems. See also: Interpretation of seeing the sky in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a teacher kissing in a dream? Seeing a teacher kissing in a dream is an indication of the great benefit from it and the appointment of the dreamer as a teacher in the same dream.

title: Secrets of interpretation of seeing long hair in a dream about good and evil by Al-Usaimi and Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Advance Encyclopedia Interpretation of seeing long hair in a dream for single people, married people, pregnant women, and men, as long hair is considered an important matter and a treasure not only for women but for men as well, and it is an endeavor for everyone. It is always known that hair grows strong and lengthens.And when long hair comes in a dream, it can simply be an expression of the dreamer's desire to have something like him in reality, since the dream world is often a mirror of a person's thoughts that come to his mind throughout the day. As soon as he closes his eyes to remain in his sleep, the subconscious mind brings him back, but there are other times when the dream has a meaning and interpretation that we will mention in detail in the following paragraphs, so follow us. Interpretation of seeing long hair in a dreamWe present to you in the following paragraph the most important things mentioned by dream interpretation scholars: Seeing long hair in a dream: Seeing hair Long hair in a dream indicates the arrival of goodness to the pioneer and the increase in lawful money blessed for him by God’s command, and it may also indicate that his condition will change to happiness and joy. Long hair may also indicate that in the coming days the dreamer will acquire great wealth or inheritance, or the success of the upcoming business plan. And prepare for it. Sometimes seeing long hair is an unpleasant vision, in the case of a girl who is engaged or married and the fiancée or lover turns away from her, and disputes arise between them depending on the length of the hair and how long it is. Dark color. Seeing long hair in a dream symbolizes a poor or indebted person getting rid of poverty or paying off debts. Braided or braided hair in a dream suggests fears, knots or debts that increase as the braids grow in length. Thick black hair symbolizes those who are really worried About the extent of their efforts to get rid of these fears, but they are unable to do so. Long hair in a dream Al-Osaimi says: Seeing it raises status and increases blessing and goodness. Seeing a man looking at a girl’s long hair with admiration indicates her imminent marriage. I dreamed that my sister’s hair was long. Seeing my sister’s long hair is not A married woman is evidence of her soon marriage. As for her sister who is still in training, this is good news for her success. The sister was combing her sister’s hair in the dream, and her hair was tangled and she could not pass the comb through its strands, which symbolizes her sister’s suffering from problems and sorrows, and her sister needs to stand up Next to her. Seeing a sister cutting her sister’s hair in a dream is a bad omen for a quarrel between the two brothers, but it will end soon, with God’s will. Interpretation of seeing long hair for a single woman. Below are the interpretations of seeing a single girl with long hair in a dream: Smooth, curly black hair shows that a well-to-do young man has proposed to her. With marriage and their marriage will be good and you will live a happy life with him by God’s command. While the hair is long and curly and you tried to style it, the interpretation depends on two cases, the first of which is if you are able to wear it, then it is good that all the distress or sadness you feel is over, while the weakness. Her style and dangerous entanglements show her inability to overcome these problems, and God knows best. Cutting one’s hair in a dream portends the end of an engagement or romantic relationship.

title: Interpretation of dreaming about something entering the claw in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of something that goes into the nails in a dream for an unmarried girl, or a married woman, or a pregnant woman, or a divorced woman, or a married or unmarried person, either a thorn or a piece of wood that entered under the nail and removed the nail. Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq, and others. Nails in a dream have many, many meanings that can Acquiring them, as seeing nails in a dream is linked to many other elements in the dream or in your practical life in order to obtain the correct interpretation, as nails are one of the important blessings that God bestows on our body, as they exist to protect the feet and hands from pollution and other matters. We see it in our dreams in many meanings and forms that require a correct interpretation, to know the reason for the vision. Interpretation of something entering the nail in a dream: Whoever dreams that a thorn or something similar has entered his nails, which causes him pain, this is not praiseworthy, and may indicate weak ability. Nails in a dream also represent victory over enemies, while long nails in a dream mean prosperity in practical life. It also means strength, protection from the enemy or a sign of shame. The loss or fall of nails in a dream is accompanied by more than one interpretation depending on the state of the dream, which means that it has lost its wealth. The international Arab translator Ibn Sirin, the most famous dream interpreter in Arab and Islamic history, explained to us that we see nails in a dream with more than one interpretation that Ibn Sirin explained to us, which is As follows: Interpretation of nails in a dream: Claws in a dream mean victory over enemies. The appearance of disease in the nails is evidence of weak religion. Seeing short nails in a dream means bankruptcy. Seeing white nails in a dream indicates integrity and avoiding worldly temptations. Seeing the loss of a nail is a sign of loss. Money. Seeing nails trimmed in a dream with sharp performance in addition to scissors with pain, is evidence of making a difficult but correct decision. To dream of cutting nails with scissors means a change in your emotional and social life. Cutting another person’s nails is evidence that the fortuneteller will act as a support for that person. Seeing nail polish in a dream is a sign of perseverance. Seeing nails being removed in a dream is a sign of misfortunes. In general, seeing nails in a dream is something that is not very harmful except in the cases mentioned only, and Ibn Shaheen’s interpretations interpret seeing nails in a dream like Ibn Sirin’s interpretation. And Nabulsi.

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing tickets in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing tickets in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about tickets in a dream It is a document through which a person records travel from one place to another according to that person’s desire. There are many means of travel such as a train, plane, or ship, and seeing travel tickets in a dream certainly indicates many different indicators and concepts. Interpretation of a dream about tickets by Ibn SirinAlso Ibn Sirin says about the interpretation of seeing travel tickets in a dream, if the dreamer sees himself buying tickets, then this is a praiseworthy vision for him, as he sees a travel ticket to Mecca. Interpretation of a dream about traveling in a dream has multiple connotations, so seeing a trip From one place to another is evidence that the individual will change the situation significantly for the better and his life will become many positives. Whoever sees in a dream that he is happy while traveling, this indicates that the dreamer’s condition will be much better. When a person sees in a dream that he is traveling abroad and facing the country Many problems, this is a sign of a bad life. Interpretation of a dream about tickets in a dream for a single woman: Seeing single women on a plane ticket in a dream is evidence of many problems and fears that they face, and sometimes seeing them shopping can indicate the fulfillment of the dreams that you are looking for. Cutting travel tickets close to the wedding and perhaps getting married, depending on your marital status. Not being able to travel or book tickets is evidence of the sorrows and problems presented, and the story of travel in a dream carries many meanings and interpretations. A solo trip in a dream is a success in business or a change in business. Which you are looking for in the future. Interpretation of a dream about buying tickets in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a married woman getting a ticket in her dream, indicates the fulfillment of desires that she wants to fulfill. Seeing a married woman getting married with her tickets in a far away place means that kindness is coming to the family. Circumstances are also changing for the better. , physically and socially. As for seeing tears or losing tickets, this is a warning to her that the dear dreamer has lost. Interpretation of a dream about buying tickets in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing a pregnant woman is mentioned in her dream, because it shows the end of the problems and pains of pregnancy. Seeing tickets for a pregnant woman is a sign of her easy birth. If a pregnant woman wants to travel to a distant place and dreams of booking a ticket to travel there. This indicates that he will go there by God’s command and that the vision can reflect the thoughts and desires of the subconscious. Interpretation of a dream about tickets in a dream for a man. Seeing tickets in a man’s dream indicates the opportunity to find Travel, marriage, or work. Seeing tickets in his hand after obtaining the visa indicates that he has a strong desire for security. Seeing him buying a plane ticket to Egypt is a welcome vision because it is the land of Kenya and security. Seeing a travel ticket to Tunisia is a compliment to him because he comes from the same race If you see that single people have bought a plane ticket to honorable lands, this indicates marriage to a person of good nature and a happy life.

title: Interpretation of a dream about snakes in the house and killing them

preview.html: The visions may differ according to the viewer for an unmarried girl, a young man, a married man, and others, which we will learn about now through the website gptafser.com/. Interpretation of seeing snakes in the house and killing them in a dream for a single girl. An unmarried woman dreams of a snake trying to bite her while it is hitting her, indicating that she is getting rid of problems. A girl who dreams of a snake and is not afraid of it is evidence that she is aware of a malicious personality and is trying to harm her. Also, a dream of a snake that appears in the dream of an unmarried woman and is not afraid of it is evidence that she was deceived into loving someone. The girl should stay away from this young man. Immediately, because it falls into evil and misfortune. See also: Seeing small snakes in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing snakes in the house and killing them in a dream for a married woman. A married woman who dreams of killing a large snake is evidence that she has survived a major crisis that has surrounded her. This vision also suggests that she She was in the hands of her enemies who surrounded her, but now she is getting rid of them. The appearance of a snake in a married woman’s house in a dream indicates the presence of an enemy hiding in her house or her friends. A snake in a married woman’s dream indicates many problems that happen to her every day in her life. These A woman who sees a snake in her dream shows that she does not enjoy any of the luxury and happiness in life. When a married woman kills a snake in a dream, this indicates the coming of joy, happiness, and abundant sustenance for her in the future. Interpretation of seeing snakes in the house and killing them in a dream for a man and its meaning. The dream indicates the presence of a snake In a man’s house, there is an evil person with him who wants to make him fall into evil. The smooth snake that obeys the man in a dream and does not feel fear with him is evidence of the presence of good money and abundance. Seeing the snake surrounding the dreamer without harming him indicates that he has many enemies who are conspiring. Against him, but he is strong. A person who sees a water snake in his dream is evidence of the coming of good food, abundance, blessings and salvation from worries and problems. The snake that appears in a man’s dream in his home and family indicates that one of the members of the house is conspiring against him and his family. On this A man should take care and be careful with everyone around him so as not to harm him and his family members. The presence of a snake in a dream, or the appearance of its skin or flesh, indicates the presence of goodness and happiness that he will gain soon. A dream about a snake in a man’s bed is evidence of the death of his wife or someone close to him. If one sees snakes coming out of places and homes, this indicates the annihilation and destruction of that place. Read also: Seeing a snake in a dream and killing it at the hands of Imam Al-Sadiq The meaning of seeing snakes in the house and killing them in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation The symbol of snakes that a pregnant woman saw in her room is evidence of feelings of sadness And the anxiety that accompanies pregnancy. A pregnant woman is bitten by a snake in a dream. This is a sign of a serious health problem or possible loss of the fetus. Seeing snakes in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates the strength of pain and extreme fatigue for that woman at that particular time. If killed

title: Interpretation of oud incense in a dream for unmarried and pregnant women

preview.html: In the following article, we explain to you what is the interpretation of agarwood incense in a dream for an unmarried girl, a married woman, and a pregnant woman, as explained by the interpreter scholar Muhammad ibn Sirin. His dream is to light incense or smell its scent, and he wants to know the interpretation of this dream. Therefore, we will explain to you through the following encyclopedia paragraphs the interpretation of this dream in detail, so follow us. Interpretation of oud incense in a dream. Interpretation of oud incense in a dream by Ibn Sirini. The great scholar Muhammad ibn Sirin says that seeing wood incense in a dream means that you will hear Good news in the coming days. If the sleeper sees in his dream that he is using incense to perfume himself with it, this is a sign of a good reputation among people. Seeing wood incense in a dream indicates the end of disputes and quarrels between the dreamer and others. Seeing incense sticks in his hand in a dream indicates Recovering things that the dreamer lost. Seeing wood incense spreading in the house indicates the birth of a new child in that house and the child will obtain a prominent position in the future. If the sleeper is suffering from an illness and sees incense in his dream, this is a sign of recovery from illnesses. Seeing incense in a dream It indicates the invalidity of magic performed by others with the intention of harming the dreamer. Seeing incense in the home indicates removing worries, solving problems, and alleviating anxiety. If the dreamer is not married and sees in a dream that he is using aloes incense, this is a good vision that foretells him marrying a good girl, and it will always help him to Performing acts of worship. Oud incense in a single woman’s dream. If an unmarried girl sees incense in her dream, this is a vision that indicates happy events that will come in her life. This vision could be a sign of success in studies or the approaching date of marriage. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream She lights incense and inhales its scent. This is a good vision that indicates the goodness that she will receive soon. Lighting incense from wood in an unmarried girl’s dream shows her good reputation among people and that others always remind her of kindness. Interpretation of aloes incense in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees in her dream that she Lighting incense, this vision shows the goodness that you will soon receive. Seeing incense smoke filling the house in a married woman’s dream indicates the arrival of happy events that will bring joy to her home and family. If a married woman sees in her dream that she is sitting in the mosque and smells the scent of oud incense, this indicates Her children excelled in studies, and if she suffers from an illness, this is a vision that portends haste. Recovery. Seeing frankincense in a married woman’s dream is a good vision and indicates the stability of marital life and the end of controversy. If a married woman sees in her dream that she is using agarwood incense to perfume the house, this is a vision that indicates her good personality and this vision portends achieving the goals she seeks. Interpretation of a dream about incense for a pregnant woman: Seeing frankincense in a pregnant woman’s dream has many praiseworthy connotations, so this vision portends that she will get rid of the problems she suffers from, and this dream also indicates an end to worry and relief from
